data.title: Oracle Call Center
data.meta_description: Call Center Software Predictive Dialer Software
data.text:
Agents can work efficiently form anywhere in the world with a 360-degree views into customer interactions and real-time business intelligence. Supervisors are empowered with instantly customizable screens and real-time tools for monitoring and coaching agents, no matter where they are located. And administrators can adapt to changing needs with real-time administration tools for implementing moves, adds and changes. Contact Center Anywhere is available in a cloud hosted configuration. Whether you are a 10 or 5000 seat contact center, Promero’s solution provides a contact center solution that will fit your financial need.

Salesforce CRM is Gartner’s 2012 top performing CRM for customer service contact centers. Promero is a Salesforce AppExchange Partner with a certified and secured CTI solution to integrate Contact Center Anywhere with Salesforce CRM. What makes this better? The CTI is free for all Promero hosted Contact Center Anywhere customers. Add Contact Center Anywhere with Salesforce CRM and you have the complete customer service and sales team solution.
